Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and the Unpaid Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz, Alley, and a woman and establishes a conflict around an unpaid debt after a dramatic rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Wet Predicament and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is rescued by Alley, who immediately demands repayment of an old debt, leading to a tense exchange.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Wet Predicament and Unpaid Debt

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade and Purchase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley's decision to trade in his old dinosaur, Dinny, leading him to Honest Zog's dealership and the purchase of a new, smaller dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In Consideration
sub_scenes.description: Alley considers trading in Dinny due to his clumsiness and discusses this with another character.

sub_scenes.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Alley and the unnamed character visit Honest Zog's dealership and browse for a new dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Compact Dinosaur Test Drive
sub_scenes.description: Alley and the unnamed character test drive a smaller dinosaur and are impressed by its speed.

sub_scenes.title: Deal Sealed and Dino-Bite
sub_scenes.description: Despite a surprising hat-biting incident, Alley and the unnamed character finalize the deal for the new dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Deal Sealed and Zog's Dino's Bite

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Dinny
sub_scenes.description: Alley bids a sad farewell to Dinny, acknowledging their parting.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Farewell and Mixed Feelings about Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Departure with New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: Alley departs the dealership with the new dinosaur, leaving Dinny behind.

narrative_arcs.title: Departure with New Dino & Zog's Advice

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Fate at the Dealership
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is marked down for sale at the dealership.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Re-sale and Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dinny's experience after being traded in, including his appraisal, a chaotic test ride, and Alley's return to rescue him after learning about his mistreatment.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Appraisal and Discount
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is appraised and discounted at the dealership, attracting potential buyers.

sub_scenes.title: Wild Test Ride
sub_scenes.description: A potential buyer's test ride on Dinny turns chaotic and unruly.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpectedly Wild Test Ride on Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Roar Recognized
sub_scenes.description: Dinny's roar after the chaotic ride is recognized by someone familiar with him.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback of Dinny's Mistreatment
sub_scenes.description: A flashback reveals Dinny's past mistreatment, explaining his current behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Plan for Dinny
sub_scenes.description: A character decides to rescue Dinny after learning about his mistreatment.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Reunion and Return
sub_scenes.description: Dinny returns with his original rider, causing anticipation and apprehension among onlookers.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley and Coola's Fishing Trip Dispute
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a brief conflict between Alley and Coola regarding a fishing invitation and their relationship dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, but she rejects him, initiating a relationship conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Coola accuses Alley of taking her for granted, escalating their argument.

sub_scenes.title: Abrupt End and Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: Coola ends the argument with physical retaliation, hitting Alley.

Major_Arcs.title: Misogynistic Commentary During Fishing
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc consists of a thematic interlude where various cavemen express misogynistic views while fishing.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Musings
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen express stereotypical negative views about women in separate scenes.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Frustration and Screaming
sub_scenes.description: A caveman's loud screaming while fishing annoys another fisherman.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Apology by Riverbank
sub_scenes.description: A fishing argument escalates to insults and then a sudden apology.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Apology by the Riverbank

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry over Oola
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on romantic rivalry and accusations involving Oola and several cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation of Romantic Competition
sub_scenes.description: A caveman is accused of romantic competition for Oola's attention.

sub_scenes.title: Reluctant Investigation
sub_scenes.description: The accused caveman decides to investigate the claims, despite his skepticism.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery and Compliments
sub_scenes.description: The investigation reveals Oola receiving compliments from another caveman, confirming the accusations.

Major_Arcs.title: Misdirected Jealousy and its Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a violent outburst of jealousy, its misdirection, and the subsequent realization and shift in perspective.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Accusation and Attack
sub_scenes.description: A caveman violently attacks another due to perceived romantic jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Clarification of Target
sub_scenes.description: The aggressor clarifies that he attacked the wrong person, revealing a misdirected anger.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Comfort
sub_scenes.description: The woman comforts the injured caveman, revealing a romantic connection.

sub_scenes.title: Realization and New Perspective
sub_scenes.description: The angry caveman realizes his mistake and contemplates learning about romance.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Advice and Mentoring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on romantic advice given to cavemen, contrasting violent approaches with romantic techniques.

sub_scenes.title: Advice on Romantic Approach
sub_scenes.description: A calm caveman advises the angry caveman to use romance instead of violence to win back Oola.

sub_scenes.title: Mentoring in Romantic Technique
sub_scenes.description: A small caveman mentors a larger caveman on observing romantic techniques.

Major_Arcs.title: Koko and Oola's Romantic Entanglements and Jealousy Escalation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details further romantic entanglements of Koko and Oola, escalating jealousy, and comical sabotage attempts.

sub_scenes.title: Rivalry and Sabotage Attempt
sub_scenes.description: A jealous caveman attempts to sabotage Koko's romantic gesture with Oola.

sub_scenes.title: Failed Sabotage and Insult
sub_scenes.description: Oola harshly rebukes the jealous caveman for his failed sabotage.

sub_scenes.title: Angry Accusation of Theft
sub_scenes.description: A muscular caveman angrily accuses someone of stealing 'oola' from him.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude
sub_scenes.description: Koko and Oola share a romantic moment in a cave.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Interlude and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Accusation of Cannibalism
sub_scenes.description: Oola misinterprets a romantic gesture and accuses a caveman of cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Clarification and Affection
sub_scenes.description: Oola clarifies the misunderstanding, explaining it was just a kiss, not cannibalism.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification of Affection and Misunderstood Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Accusation of Infidelity
sub_scenes.description: Oola angrily accuses a caveman of infidelity.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Retribution for Infidelity
sub_scenes.description: A blonde cavewoman violently retaliates against a caveman for infidelity.

Major_Arcs.title: Oola's Remorse and Romantic Reformation Attempts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features Oola expressing remorse and a caveman attempting romantic reformation, alongside various romantic interactions and male complaints.

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Remorse and Confession
sub_scenes.description: Oola expresses remorse and seeks forgiveness, mentioning learning from a 'Frenchman'.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reformation Declaration
sub_scenes.description: A caveman declares his intention for romantic reformation to Oola.

sub_scenes.title: Polite Courtship
sub_scenes.description: A caveman politely requests a kiss in a formal courtship manner.

sub_scenes.title: Male Camaraderie and Women Complaints
sub_scenes.description: Two cavemen bond over complaints about women while fishing.

narrative_arcs.title: Male Camaraderie and Complaint about Women

Major_Arcs.title: The Humorous and Harmful New Twist Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the 'New Twist' dance craze, its negative consequences, social pressure to participate, and comedic dance lessons.

sub_scenes.title: Consequences of the New Twist
sub_scenes.description: The negative physical consequences of the 'New Twist' dance are highlighted.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unfortunate Consequences of the New Twist

sub_scenes.title: Encouragement and Dismissal
sub_scenes.description: Contrasting opinions on the 'New Twist' dance are presented – encouragement vs. dismissal.

narrative_arcs.title: Encouragement and Dismissal of the New Twist

sub_scenes.title: Social Pressure to Participate
sub_scenes.description: Social pressure to participate in the 'New Twist' and the upcoming 'twitch party' is shown.

narrative_arcs.title: Social Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Party

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Dance Lessons
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons for 'The Twitch'.

sub_scenes.title: Painful Dance Lesson
sub_scenes.description: The dance lesson turns painful as the instructor repeatedly steps on the student's feet.

sub_scenes.title: Lesson's End and Name Reveal
sub_scenes.description: The painful dance lesson ends, and a humorous name reveal occurs.

sub_scenes.title: Post-Twitch Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of a 'twitch' event is questioned, revealing its ineffectiveness.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Twitch Inquiry and Admission of Failure

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation and Fleeing
sub_scenes.description: The 'Twitch' leads to public humiliation and characters fleeing in fear.

narrative_arcs.title: Fleeing in Fear and Public Humiliation

sub_scenes.title: Resignation from Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: A character decides he has endured enough humiliation and withdraws.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath of the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: The widespread negative impact of 'The Twitch' is revealed in a hospital setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Quiet and Watching the Aftermath

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romantic Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a time travel experiment for historical research, leading to a romantic mishap and a comedic return from ancient Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Suggestion
sub_scenes.description: Scholars discuss historical research and propose using time travel to get firsthand information.

narrative_arcs.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Suggestion

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Operation
sub_scenes.description: Alley operates a time machine, preparing for a journey.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Scene in Ancient Spain
sub_scenes.description: Alley arrives in ancient Spain and witnesses a romantic scene.

sub_scenes.title: Impulsive Kiss Request
sub_scenes.description: A caveman impulsively requests a kiss from a cavewoman.

sub_scenes.title: Reluctant Agreement to Kiss
sub_scenes.description: The cavewoman reluctantly agrees to the kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Time Traveler Tuning Machine
sub_scenes.description: The time traveler tunes his machine, preparing to observe 'Oop's century'.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Traveler's Successful Tuning and Observation

sub_scenes.title: Kiss Interruption and Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: The romantic kiss is interrupted by time travel activation.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Kiss Interruption and Time Travel Activation

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Present Time
sub_scenes.description: The caveman and cavewoman are unexpectedly transported to the present during their kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Travel and Accidental Kiss in the Present

sub_scenes.title: Confusion in the Lab
sub_scenes.description: The caveman and cavewoman are confused in the time traveler's lab in the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Confused in the Present Time Lab

sub_scenes.title: The Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: The time traveler explains his important assignment in Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Angry Reaction to Interrupted Kiss
sub_scenes.description: The cavewoman expresses anger about her interrupted kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Thesis Justification
sub_scenes.description: The time traveler justifies the time travel by explaining the importance of his thesis.

sub_scenes.title: Reassurance and Return Preparation
sub_scenes.description: The cavewoman is reassured, and preparations for a return to Spain are hinted at.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Impending Return to Spain

sub_scenes.title: Return to Ancient Spain
sub_scenes.description: Someone is successfully sent back to ancient Spain, completing the assignment.

Major_Arcs.title: Misadventures in a Strange Land
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a caveman-like character's confusing and comical misadventures in a strange, possibly Spanish, land.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Strange Land
sub_scenes.description: A caveman-like character arrives in a strange land and expresses confusion.

sub_scenes.title: Street Serenade and Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The caveman encounters a street serenade and decides to intervene in a misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Misguided Attack and Furious Interruption
sub_scenes.description: The caveman attacks the musician, leading to a furious intervention by a woman.

sub_scenes.title: The Famous Matador
sub_scenes.description: The woman reveals herself as a famous matador.

sub_scenes.title: Apology and Manager's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: The caveman apologizes as a manager arrives, suggesting further complications.

sub_scenes.title: The Famous Don's Disturbance
sub_scenes.description: A separate scene reveals someone being scolded for disturbing a famous Don.

narrative_arcs.title: The Famous Don and the Disturbance

sub_scenes.title: Balcony Observer
sub_scenes.description: A balcony woman dismisses the noise from outside, providing a bystander perspective.

Major_Arcs.title: Unconventional Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts an unconventional bullfight where a brute uses a club instead of traditional weapons, leading to a surprising victory.

sub_scenes.title: Siesta Interruption Explained
sub_scenes.description: The reason for the commotion and unconscious man is explained - Don Jose's siesta interruption.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Ignorance and Confidence
sub_scenes.description: A character questions the 'brute's' bull fighting knowledge, revealing his naive confidence.

sub_scenes.title: Novel Bullfight Idea
sub_scenes.description: A character contemplates a 'novelty' related to bullfighting.

sub_scenes.title: Arena Setting and Bullfight Ethics Debate
sub_scenes.description: Characters discuss the ethics of bull fighting in an arena setting.

sub_scenes.title: Setting Stage for Unconventional Bullfight
sub_scenes.description: Spectators in the arena discuss the unusual bullfight participant.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting the Stage for an Unconventional Bullfight

sub_scenes.title: Arena Encouragement and Caution
sub_scenes.description: Onlookers offer contrasting advice to the 'brute' before the bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Bull Introduction and Understated Threat
sub_scenes.description: The bull is introduced into the arena, downplaying its threat humorously.

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Combat
sub_scenes.description: The 'brute' attacks the bull with a club in an unconventional manner.

sub_scenes.title: Victory and Acclaim
sub_scenes.description: The 'brute' wins the bullfight, receiving arena acclaim.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley's Return from Time Travel and Kiss Debacle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley's return from time travel and the comedic events surrounding a promised kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Planning to Retrieve OOP
sub_scenes.description: Plans are made to retrieve 'oop' from the past.

sub_scenes.title: Sarcastic Welcome
sub_scenes.description: A sarcastic welcome awaits 'oop' upon his return.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Chaotic Return
sub_scenes.description: Alley returns in a chaotic state, tied up and amidst a 'BZAP!' event.

sub_scenes.title: The Promised Kiss
sub_scenes.description: A promised kiss is anticipated.

sub_scenes.title: Kiss Denied Due to Jealousy
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy and interrogation prevent the promised kiss from happening.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and its Ironic Reality
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the ironic reality of being 'King for a Day', contrasting the perceived ease with the actual chaotic experience.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Procession
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' procession begins with sarcastic undertones.

sub_scenes.title: Interrupted Procession
sub_scenes.description: The king's procession is abruptly interrupted.

sub_scenes.title: Debate on King's Easy Life
sub_scenes.description: A debate arises about whether being king is an easy job.

narrative_arcs.title: Debate on the King's Easy Life

sub_scenes.title: Search for Temporary King
sub_scenes.description: A search for a temporary king begins.

sub_scenes.title: The Chosen Replacement
sub_scenes.description: A temporary king is chosen.

Major_Arcs.title: Chaotic Reality of Temporary Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the chaotic and disrespectful reality of temporary kingship, contrasting with the expected respect.

sub_scenes.title: Instructions for Temporary Kingship
sub_scenes.description: Instructions are given for treating the temporary king with respect.

sub_scenes.title: Rejection of Temporary King
sub_scenes.description: The villagers immediately reject and attack the temporary king.

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King's Retreat
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king retreats and reflects on his experience.

sub_scenes.title: Original King's Satisfied Return
sub_scenes.description: The original king returns, satisfied with the outcome of the temporary kingship.

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Temporary Kingship and Oompa's Treatment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Guz temporarily taking the King's place and facing harsh treatment from Oompa.

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Indulgence and Bon-Bon Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Guz's leisure is interrupted when Oompa reveals his 'bon-bons' are ulcer pills.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Lazy Indulgence and Bon-Bon Mishap

sub_scenes.title: Broom Attack
sub_scenes.description: Oompa attacks Guz with a broom for getting the floor dirty.

narrative_arcs.title: Broom Attack and Temporary King Plea

sub_scenes.title: Foot Washing and Vacation Insight
sub_scenes.description: Guz is forced to wash his feet and realizes why Guz takes so many vacations.

Major_Arcs.title: Dispute Over Clams
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a comical dispute between cavemen over found clams, escalating into accusations and a search for wisdom.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Fighting
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of cheating and physical fighting break out over money.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Cheating and Fighting Over Money

sub_scenes.title: Explanation of Dispute
sub_scenes.description: The dispute is clarified as being about ownership of found clams.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Wise Counsel and Loss
sub_scenes.description: The characters decide to seek wise counsel, but the clams are discovered to be missing.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Wise Counsel and Loss of Clams

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Life and Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts various facets of royal life, including violence, dining, and the King's reactions to disturbances.

sub_scenes.title: Investigating Racket and Wise Guy Beating
sub_scenes.description: A king investigates a racket and finds a 'Wise Guy' being beaten.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and the Wise Guy's Beating

sub_scenes.title: Fine Advisor's Self-Serving Meal
sub_scenes.description: The 'Fine Advisor' enjoys a meal while thinking about keeping money for himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Fine Advisor's Meal and Self-Serving Thoughts

sub_scenes.title: King's Dinosaur Dinner
sub_scenes.description: The King enjoys a lavish dinosaur dinner.

sub_scenes.title: Food Fight and Ulcer Reminder
sub_scenes.description: A food fight erupts, reminding the King of his ulcer.

Major_Arcs.title: King's Ulcer, Dietary Demands, and Servant's Discontent
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the King's health concerns, his dietary demands related to his ulcer, and the growing discontent of his servant.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Query and Parsley Offering
sub_scenes.description: A character questions the King about his ulcer, leading to dietary demands.

sub_scenes.title: Servant's Regret
sub_scenes.description: The servant expresses regret and disillusionment with his job.

sub_scenes.title: Sudden Violence
sub_scenes.description: Playful interaction abruptly turns violent as the servant attacks the King.

Major_Arcs.title: Apology, Royal Liberation, and Ruler Proposition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc includes a scene of apology and reconciliation, followed by a character's liberation from royalty and a ruler proposition to Alley-How.

sub_scenes.title: Sincere Apology for Injury
sub_scenes.description: A crowned female caveman sincerely apologizes for injuring another caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Liberation from Royalty
sub_scenes.description: A muscular caveman expresses joy at being liberated from royalty.

sub_scenes.title: Ruler Proposition and Measuring Task
sub_scenes.description: Alley-How is proposed to be ruler, but it's revealed to be for a measuring task.

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act: Prophecy and Forceful Haircuts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a self-contained humorous story about a barber who abducts customers, fulfilling a prophecy.

sub_scenes.title: The Barberous Act and Bearded Stranger Revelation
sub_scenes.description: A prophecy about a bearded stranger leads to a barber forcefully 'recruiting' customers.

narrative_arcs.title: The Barberous Act and the Bearded Stranger

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishap and Arrival of Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a time machine experiment that goes slightly awry, resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment to bring someone from the past to the present begins.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor

sub_scenes.title: Jumping Jupiter and Machine Fix
sub_scenes.description: A time machine malfunction is implied, but the Time Traveler seems to resolve it.
